thread.title: Trump Administration Looking at Bankruptcy Options for Student Debt

author: Josh Mitchell
title: Trump Administration Looking at Bankruptcy Options for Student Debt
text:
WASHINGTON—The Trump administration is looking to clarify when Americans can discharge student loans in bankruptcy, responding to concerns that more borrowers will be stuck under huge debt burdens for years.

Since 1998, federal law has prohibited Americans from discharging student loans made by the federal government, except in extremely rare circumstances.
